paragraphs.body: This may seem a little silly, but I know how biased I was at first. I would like to know which members are the least disinclined to review a songfic. You do a fantastic job of being impartial to style most of the time, but I would really like a review by a person who doesn't completely hate songfics, who will take into account not just the writing, but how well it relates to each line of the song. Sorry to be a pain... Frui (🌹 • 🐝 • 🐝🐝) 15:31, January 15, 2013 (UTC)

paragraphs.body: This is an issue that has been on my mind for quite some time, and in light of the past few weeks I think it is time for me to address them with an appropriate course of action. I would like to firstly note that this is not simply because I have had a busy few weeks, but because I have seen my lifestyle change and evolve over the course of my seventeenth year. I have realized that as my time allotted for reading, analyzing, and critiquing the fanfics of the Fanon Portal has decreased, the quality of my reviews has diminished as well. It is a simple relationship that I am sure my fellow reviewers have noticed in their work as well; generally, it is an issue that can be addressed over time, however problems arise when a situation morphs in such a way that there is no simple solution.
paragraphs.text: This is an issue that has been on my mind for quite some time, and in light of the past few weeks I think it is time for me to address them with an appropriate course of action. I would like to firstly note that this is not simply because I have had a busy few weeks, but because I have seen my lifestyle change and evolve over the course of my seventeenth year. I have realized that as my time allotted for reading, analyzing, and critiquing the fanfics of the Fanon Portal has decreased, the quality of my reviews has diminished as well. It is a simple relationship that I am sure my fellow reviewers have noticed in their work as well; generally, it is an issue that can be addressed over time, however problems arise when a situation morphs in such a way that there is no simple solution.

paragraphs.body: My life has been becoming more and more congested as I am progressing through my time as a high school student onto my status one day as a university student. Unfortunately, my afternoons can no longer be filled with hours of reading fanfiction, rather they are filled with hours of instrument practice, studying, and what little exercise for which I can make time. I find myself exhausted at 12:30 in the morning and barely able to keep myself awake to post a wordy and rather poorly written resignation. I find that my decision has come down to the choice as to whether I want to sleep and get good grades, get good grades and be a member of the Fanon Review Squad, or be a member of the FRS and sleep. I mean no offense to the group when I say that of those three options, I would prefer to sleep and get good grades.
paragraphs.text: My life has been becoming more and more congested as I am progressing through my time as a high school student onto my status one day as a university student. I find that my decision has come down to the choice as to whether I want to sleep and get good grades, get good grades and be a member of the Fanon Review Squad, or be a member of the FRS and sleep. I mean no offense to the group when I say that of those three options, I would prefer to sleep and get good grades.

paragraphs.body: The writers of the Fanon Portal deserve to have a reviewer who can always give his/her full attention to their work. Maybe at first I was able to do so, or maybe I never have really been able to give my full attention to reviewing these writings. As an individual, I cannot let myself give half an effort to anything, but at this point in time I think I am physically incapable of giving my full effort to the Fanon Review Squad, thus I am stepping down from my position. I will complete the reviews on my schedule to the best of my ability as soon as I can, and I hope that my advice may serve to help these writers in some way.

paragraphs.body: But the time has come for me to take my leave from the FRS. It's been an incredibly fun and educational experience for me, but with college and my current projects all colliding at once, I feel like something has to give. I want to, if I were to stay on with you guys, devote enough time to this to do the best I can. As it is now, I can't devote that kind of time. Thus, I am resigning from the FRS. Obviously, I'll finish all remaining reviews; I should have everything done by October's end at the latest. It's been fun, and I hate to put the stress of finding someone else on you guys. But...it has to be done.
paragraphs.text: But the time has come for me to take my leave from the FRS. It's been an incredibly fun and educational experience for me, but with college and my current projects all colliding at once, I feel like something has to give. I want to, if I were to stay on with you guys, devote enough time to this to do the best I can. As it is now, I can't devote that kind of time. Thus, I am resigning from the FRS. Obviously, I'll finish all remaining reviews; I should have everything done by October's end at the latest. It's been fun, and I hate to put the stress of finding someone else on you guys. But...it has to be done.

paragraphs.body: Excuse me if I come off as a bit mad, but I do see this as unacceptable. Now, I know everyone has a busy life, and I am aware of that. But about 7 months ago I was supposed to have a review done, however, to this day it has not been completed. It was to be done by PreservationsWings, and I realize that he has resigned from FRS, but he never finished those reviews. After 7 months, I think that either PW would've had time to finish those reviews, or you, as a group would've divided all of the reviews and finished them. It anticipation of 1 of those 2 options, I decided to bid my time and wait. As Option 1 hasn't happened, I am requesting that someone takes care of all of PW's remaining reviews. Thank you, Srijay K - TechFilmer 13:38, October 11, 2013 (UTC)
